atributes.sql:
SELECT 'ALL','All Websites' FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT store_id,code FROM @core_store

title: Bestsellers
report_sql:
SELECT product_name as `Product name`,
       CONCAT(ROUND(total,2),' ',currency) as `Total`,
	   orders as `Orders`
FROM (
  SELECT B.name as product_name,
      SUM(B.row_total_incl_tax*A.base_to_global_rate) AS total,
	  A.global_currency_code as currency,
     COUNT(1) as orders
  FROM @sales_flat_order A
  INNER JOIN @sales_flat_order_item B
   ON A.entity_id= B.order_id
  WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN :STARTDATE AND :ENDDATE
   AND (':STORE_ID'='ALL' OR A.store_id=':STORE_ID')
 GROUP BY B.name
) r
ORDER BY r.total desc

atributes.reportDescription: Sales Information (Product Name, Total sales, number of sales) grouped by product name.
